        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.For " is_primary "  and " archive_wu ":**
          Description:
          If Yes then      " 1 " ,
          If No then " 0 "
          (**e.g.**  "is_primary" : "0"),
          
          **2.To get [ user ] and [ password ]:** Contact to system administrator.
          
          **3.Select protocol as http / https.**
          
          **4.To get [ api_key  ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ): 
          /tokens/token-list/\{id\}
          ( **e.g.** "id": 14,             "name": "BAI2_Interface") 
          
          **5.To get [ DSClusters  ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ): 
          /clusterDetails/DSlist
          ( **e.g.** "id": 194,                         "name": "dev2608" )
          
          **6.To get [ createdby ]:**       
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ): 
          /userDetails/users
          (**e.g.** "id": 2047,  "first_name": "Read Write Admin")  
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
